title: Bug 118780: Incorrect column names displayed in expression builder after setting aliases
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder, the original column names are displayed instead of the alias names that were set for the columns.
EB: In the expression builder, when selecting the dataset and double-clicking on a column name, the alias name should be used instead of the original column name. However, the original column name is listed below in the expression builder, and the alias name appears above as row['column1'] after double-clicking the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the expression builder. 
2. Select the dataset that has alias names set for its columns. 
3. Double-click on a column name in the expression builder. 

Expected Result: The alias name should appear in the expression builder when the column is selected. 
Actual Result: The original column name is displayed instead of the alias name.
